This is necessary to copy 
```{r setup1, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE, echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE)
```

```{r spades4dummies1}
filesToCopy <- dir(pattern = "dl_.*html", full.names = TRUE, path = "~/GitHub/SpaDES.Workshops", recursive = TRUE)
filesToRender <- gsub(filesToCopy, pattern = "dl_", replacement = "")
filesToRender <- gsub(filesToRender, pattern = "vignettes", replacement = "docs/articles")
lapply(seq(filesToCopy), function(fn) file.copy(filesToCopy[fn], to = filesToRender[fn], overwrite = TRUE))

```
